an3.47:4.1: “Mendicants, conditioned phenomena have these three characteristics.
an3.47:4.3: Arising is apparent, vanishing is apparent, and change while persisting is apparent.
an3.47:4.4: These are the three characteristics of conditioned phenomena.”
an3.47:7.3: No arising is apparent, no vanishing is apparent, and no change while persisting is apparent.
an3.47:7.4: These are the three characteristics of unconditioned phenomena.”
